applied_context.a: Pilot project: Implemented experimentally for six months, followed by evaluation for permanent integration or suspension.
applied_context.b: Summer period: In effect from July 1st to August 31st each year, with annual evaluation for reapplication.
applied_context.c: Specific project: Applied during the software development project until the end of Q1 2025, followed by evaluation.
applied_context.d: Exceptional situation: Implemented for an indefinite period in response to the health situation, reassessed every three months.
